remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelCellPosition> to set the position of a child control in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control. For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md).
